item.title: TL;DR #003 – Go to Market; Web3 Collaboration; Index Network
item.description: Speculation as go-to-market Strategy DeFi From Variant: https://variant.fund/articles/speculation-as-go-to-market-strategy-defi/ All builders know Boostraping methods are the sinews of war for crypto product. Users are worried about their money and the risk of a new smart contract. => team needs to provide a compelling product to reassure future users and give them good incentives. Currently, the most successful project achieves rapid PMF by enabling financial speculation => purpose: providing the initial liquidity spark for the protocol properly function ~ New DeFi entrants should focus on providing UX that welcomes speculators
